definition: serosa/serous membrane (smooth moist delicate membranes lining body cavities)

sentences.english: The rectal wall is thin and has no serosal covering .
sentences.chinese: 直腸壁薄而沒有漿膜覆蓋。

sentences.english: The infectious serositis of duck is named Riemerella anatipestifer infection also .
sentences.chinese: 鴨傳染性漿膜炎又稱鴨疫裏默桿菌病。

sentences.english: Objective To study the type of serosal involvement for gastric cancer and postoperative peritoneal metastasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胃癌漿膜類型預測術後腹膜轉移的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: The boundary between tunica adventitia which is serosa and submucosa is not obvious.
sentences.chinese: 外膜爲漿膜，與黏膜下層分界不明顯。

sentences.english: Gastric cancer with serosal invasion and lymph node metastasis had much higher expression rate.
sentences.chinese: 有漿膜侵襲和淋巴結轉移的胃癌呈顯著高表達。

sentences.english: The gross appearance of the bowel may be normal from the serosal surface.
sentences.chinese: 腸管肉眼所見，漿膜面可以正常。

sentences.english: Insulin was as effective whether it was added on the mucosal or the serosal side.
sentences.chinese: 不管胰島素加在粘膜側或漿膜側，它都是有效的。
漿膜的炎症導致了粘連。

sentences.english: Under womb serosa, can muscle tumour peritoneoscope excise keeping a womb intact?

sentences.english: The serosal surface demonstrates reddish indurated adipose tissue that creeps over the surface.
sentences.chinese: 漿膜表面有略帶紅色堅硬的脂肪組織已蔓延至其表面。

sentences.english: Gastrointestinal serosa layer of the outer surface, so that the surface lubrication, easy activity.
sentences.chinese: 胃腸外表面有一層漿膜，使表面潤滑，便於活動。

sentences.english: The gastric subserosal hematoma was treated with percutaneous drainage and the patient recovered uneventfully.
sentences.chinese: 胃漿膜下血腫穿刺引流治療，病人恢復順利。

sentences.english: Different serosal types could be differentiated by CT features.
sentences.chinese: 通過螺旋CT徵象可大致區分漿膜類型。

sentences.english: The uterus has an intramural and a subserosal leiomyoma.
sentences.chinese: 子宮壁內和漿膜下各有一平滑肌瘤。
